titleStmt.title: A discouerie of the most secret and subtile practises of the Iesuites. Translated out of French

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for Robert Boulton, and are to be sold at his shop in Smith-field, neere to Long-lane end,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The subtile practises of the Iesuites.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
